players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Charlie is the detective and found out who the mafioso is"
You: "Charlie is the detective and found out who the mafioso is, but he's trying to cover it up by saying so publicly."
Diana: "I believe Charlie is the detective"
Diana: "Let's all work together to uncover the mafioso. Charlie claims he knows who it is, so let's trust him and see if we can piece together the clues."
You: "I'm not the mafioso, I'm just a concerned villager who wants to help figure out who it is. Let's all work together and trust Charlie as he claims to know who the mafioso is."
Charlie: "I believe Charlie is the detective and he claims to know who the mafioso is. Let's trust him and work together to uncover the truth."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie is the detective and found out who the mafioso is"
Bob: "Charlie is the detective and found out who the mafioso is, but he's trying to cover it up by saying so publicly."
Diana: "I believe Charlie is the detective"
Diana: "Let's all work together to uncover the mafioso. Charlie claims he knows who it is, so let's trust him and see if we can piece together the clues."
Bob: "I'm not the mafioso, I'm just a concerned villager who wants to help figure out who it is. Let's all work together and trust Charlie as he claims to know who the mafioso is."
You: "I believe Charlie is the detective and he claims to know who the mafioso is. Let's trust him and work together to uncover the truth."
